channel.title: On my server, im the owner, and it still sais the owner is offline?

item.title: On my server, im the owner, and it still sais the owner is offline?
item.dc:creator: @Krew_Kid Krew Kid
item.description:
@Krew_Kid wrote:

littleguy271:

i got the source earth pkz and i opened my npchandler.java and cant find if (playershandler.isplayerson where do i find it??

If its not there then you have to add it for it to be there lol

MoparscapeOwnage:

How do i fix it ?

Ok if your using phonescape source or something like that its just a type of glitch. When about 3 people log into your server it will say your online if your on

item.title: On my server, im the owner, and it still sais the owner is offline?
item.dc:creator: @lt-scape_owner lt-scape owner
item.description:
@lt-scape_owner wrote:

i get u simple guide

First open Npc handler.java
Search for

if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn

Thand delete all it contains then add folowing :

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("[urNameHere")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "[urNameHere is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "[urNameHere] is offline!"; } } }

then compile
